attributes.action: Stop the selling of Harrier Jump Jets to USMC and scrapping of current Carriers.
attributes.additional_details:
- Cancel the Selling of HMS Ark Royal
- Cancel the Selling of Our Harrier Jump Jet Fleet to USMC at reduced Price
- Cancel HMS Illustrious being mothballed or if it has to be, make sure it is kept in a reasonable state.

Perhaps when the Queen Elizabeth II class carriers are finished consider selling them and the JSF fighters to recoup the horrendous costs incurred during the planning and building process and instead build more smaller carriers similar to HMS Ark Royal etc.
